definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed

sentences.english: Still, blood is thicker than water.
Felton has to be looking over his shoulder after the Bobcats made a strong play for T.
sentences.chinese: 費爾頓得好好思量一下，畢竟夏天山貓向T。

sentences.english: CFRP, after all, is 50 times as expensive as steel.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，碳纖維增強塑料比鋼貴50倍。

sentences.english: After all, sitting and waiting is how we made money from the subprime debacle.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我們如何從次貸崩潰賺錢就是坐着等待。

sentences.english: After all, "Shaolin Soccer" is a story for the talented but unnoted .
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，少林足球是一個關於懷才不遇的故事。

sentences.english: After all, my major is English Education.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我的專業是英語教育。

sentences.english: Yet after all this drama, I still can't shake the feelings out of my system.
sentences.chinese: 然而，畢竟這戲，我仍然不能擺脫感情出我的系統。

sentences.english: In many projects, formal requirements are done as an afterthought, if at all.
sentences.chinese: 在許多項目中，正式的需求畢竟是事後產生的想法。

sentences.english: After all, few people back then had digital cameras.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，當時很少有人有數碼相機。

sentences.english: The sheldrake floats apart from the flock.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，秋沙鴨會離羣孤飛。

sentences.english: After all, they're the ones who go looking for mistresses.
sentences.chinese: 她問，“畢竟，他們是找二奶的人。”

sentences.english: After all, these enterprises often have made large investments in an infrastructure that is only compatible with IE.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，這些企業的很多基礎設施投入只能和IE兼容。

sentences.english: After all, what is there to deny?
sentences.chinese: 畢竟也沒什麼好否認的。

sentences.english: After all, the landmark Indo-US nuclear deal is immensely advantageous for India.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，里程碑式的印美核協議對印度非常有利。

sentences.english: After all, we cannot drink poison to quench thirst when it comes to jobs.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，解決就業難的問題，千萬不能飲鴆止渴。

sentences.english: And, after all, we are Harvard so we know.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我們是哈佛的，所以我們知道。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
